title: purpose of section 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Technological Universities Act 2018
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Technological Universities Act 2018 

(Section 36) (Appointed Day) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited technological university act 2018 (section 36) (appointed day) order 2022

title: purpose of section 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018)
heading: 2. The 1st day of April 2022 is appointed to be the appointed day for the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of April 2022 is appointed to be the appointed day for the 
purpose of section 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018) 
and this Order.
text_norm: 2 1st day april 2022 appointed appointed day purpose section 36 technological university act 2018 (no 3 2018) order

title: purpose of section 36 of the Technological Universities Act 2018 (No. 3 of 2018)
heading: 3. On the appointed day referred to in Article 2 –
text_raw:
3. On the appointed day referred to in Article 2 – 

(a) 

the following applicant institutes shall stand dissolved: 

(i) Galway-Mayo Institute of Technology; 

(ii) Letterkenny Institute of Technology; 

(iii) Institute of Technology, Sligo, 

and 

(b) 

the technological university known by the following name shall 
stand established: 

(i) 

in the English language, Atlantic Technological University; 

(ii) 

the Irish 

in 
Atlantaigh. 

language, Ollscoil Teicneolaíochta an 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th February, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [56] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 February, 2022. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science.
